attributes.action: offer Joanna Lumley a seat in the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna Lumley has championed the cause of the Gurkhas with energy, purpose and a highly developed sense of British fairness. Her capacity for clear, elegant and courteous communication combined with such civilised values would make her a huge asset in the upper house.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
